pages.text: If $(l:signs_abilities/selection_wheel)selected$(), the Witcher can press $(6)$(l)[$(k:origins.ternary_active)]$() $(l)(Origins: Ternary Active)$() to cast Axii - a simple hypnotic sign that will immobilise and blind the first enemy it hits for 7s. Axii has a cooldown of 14s after casting.

pages.title: Cooldown Bar
pages.text: $(l)TIP$(): Axii can be used to escape a challenging foe, or to set up an easy target!
